### Load data

These three datasets are generated in "src/parental_genetics/genotypes_experimental.R"

```{r}

# thinned imputed SNP set
thin_snps <- readRDS(file.path("data", "parental_genetics_structure", "20250203_SNPs_exp.rds"))

# mutation data frame filtered for MAF
muts_maf_filtered <- readRDS(file.path("data", "parental_genetics_structure", "20250203_FULLmuts_exp.rds"))

# sample info
samp_full_subset <- readRDS(file.path("data", "parental_genetics_structure", "20250203_samp_full_subset_exp.rds"))

```
